typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	sourceConnectionStringSecretName as string,
	sinkConnectionStringSecretName as string,
	sourceObjectName as string,
	sinkObjectName as string,
	dataFactoryName as string,
	dataFactoryPipelineName as string,
	dataFactoryPipelineRunId as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> readFromAzureBlobSingleJson
readFromAzureBlobSingleJson derive({__sourceConnectionStringSecretName} = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		{__sinkConnectionStringSecretName} = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		{__sourceObjectName} = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		{__sinkObjectName} = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		{__dataFactoryName} = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		{__dataFactoryPipelineName} = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		{__dataFactoryPipelineRunId} = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> enrichWithMetaData
enrichWithMetaData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> writeToAzureSqlDatabaseTable
